EmailTemplate.subject: Jets Certified for Super-Fast Wi-Fi ✈️
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/JetWave_Owner.html]]> Are you wondering how you can upgrade your business jet with global high-speed Wi-Fi? Do you want to have the same Wi-Fi experience at 40,000 feet as you do on the ground? Honeywell’s JetWave™ system powered by Inmarsat’s Jet ConneX Ka-band service, is now certified on more than 45+ aircraft models with more coming onboard! Check out the full list here. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/~/media/aerospace/files/brochures/jetwavecertificationlist-br.pdf]]> There’s a reason why all the major business jet manufacturers have selected JetWave™ – we enable Wi-Fi that flies. Don’t miss out on new reduced pricing through the end of 2019. Talk with our team for a quote.
CONNECT WITH OUR TEAM <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/JetWave_Owner.html]]>
